summary: Team research completed: analyzed buildSeedForList_propagates_box blocker, recommend FamilyCollection architecture (Option D) over fixing createNewFamily (Option A). Existing exists_fullySaturated_extension is SORRY-FREE and handles box_coherence as collection invariant.

artifacts.summary: Team research v10: Option D (FamilyCollection architecture) recommended over Option A (fix createNewFamily)
Teammate A: Analysis of createNewFamily fix (Option A, 8-12 hours)
Teammate B: Alternative architecture analysis (Option D, FamilyCollection)

synthesis.resolution: Option D (FamilyCollection architecture) over Option A (fix createNewFamily) because exists_fullySaturated_extension is already sorry-free
synthesis.gap_details: Witness families still need temporally coherent MCSes (separate from box propagation)
